scenes.description: 片头卷轴翻开，字幕提示“上一回 · 荒地凶险”，背景转入草原与荒地交界。

visual.composition: Golden scroll above wasteland meeting green prairie
visual.environment: Transition between dust storm sky and emerald grassland

scenes.prompt: xianxia title card, golden scroll opening over wasteland meeting prairie, cinematic lighting
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，第173集《血虹争锋》敬请诸位观赏见证。

scenes.description: 九道遁光逼近草原边缘，画面展现远方初现的绿色地带。

visual.composition: Nine streaks over yellow wasteland with green line ahead
visual.environment: Dusty sky transitioning to prairie horizon

scenes.prompt: aerial shot of cultivators nearing green horizon beyond wasteland, cinematic hopeful mood
scenes.narration: 远处绿带初现，众人暗松一口气，却仍不敢停半步，只催遁光向前。

scenes.description: 背后尘浪翻涌，白光爆鸣声从黄沙中疾速逼近。

visual.composition: Dust plume with white light streak emerging
visual.environment: Yellow sky full of flying sand

scenes.prompt: rear tracking shot of dust plume with piercing white light chasing, tense atmosphere
scenes.narration: 尖厉爆鸣自背后狂卷，黄尘中白光逼近，仿佛撕裂耳膜般震耳欲聋。

scenes.description: 白衫老者停下凝望，指出来者乃慕兰御风车。

visual.composition: Elder pointing backward, dust cloud behind

scenes.prompt: medium close-up of elder cultivator warning about approaching threat, dusty backdrop
scenes.narration: 白衫老者低喝御风车来袭，提醒车中必藏数位同阶法士强者。

scenes.description: 南陇侯掏出定星盘，抛出玉简安排三日后的集合坐标。

visual.composition: Leader handing glowing jade slips mid-air

scenes.prompt: cultivator leader distributing glowing jade slips mid-air, urgent planning scene
scenes.narration: 南陇侯亮出定星盘，掷玉简叮嘱三日后按址再会，切勿延误。

scenes.description: 九人同时变换遁光，各自冲向不同方向拉开距离。

visual.composition: Multiple light trails diverging from central point

scenes.prompt: aerial shot of cultivators splitting in different directions with colored trails, dynamic energy
scenes.narration: 众人领命四散，金白黑虹交织撕开尘幕朝不同方位蜿蜒遁逃。

scenes.description: 韩立披上血色披风，血虹遁光一闪冲向草原深处。

visual.composition: Han Li wrapped in crimson cloak becoming streak

scenes.prompt: Han Li in crimson cloak forming blood-red streak flying toward prairie, fast tracking shot
scenes.narration: 韩立披上血色披风，化作血虹直指草原最浓绿意，疾驰不休向南。

scenes.description: 御风车细节特写，骨白车厢与暗红木翅震动卷起雷光符纹。

visual.composition: Bone chariot body with wooden wings and glowing runes

scenes.prompt: close orbit shot of bone wind chariot with carved runes and wooden wings beating, ominous energy
scenes.narration: 镜头贴近御风车骨白车厢，暗红木翅振鸣牵出密集雷纹光耀惊心。

scenes.description: 御风车停驻，高空四名法士化作不同色彩的遁光分散而去。

visual.composition: Chariot releasing four auric silhouettes

scenes.prompt: wind chariot releasing four robed figures in colored auras, wide aerial view, strategic feel
scenes.narration: 御风车骤停，四名法士化作白绿蓝黑遁光分头追击撕裂尘幕而去。

scenes.description: 车身再次掉头，锁定韩立方向重新爆发光芒。

visual.composition: Chariot banking sharply with light flares

scenes.prompt: low angle shot of magical chariot banking and emitting bright light, targeting mood
scenes.narration: 短暂商议后车身掉头，杀意再度锁定韩立方向，毫不掩饰直逼而来。

scenes.description: 血虹与白光疾驰穿入草原上空，音爆撕开云层。

visual.composition: Two streaks over green prairie waves

scenes.prompt: long-lens shot of two light trails racing over prairie, sonic booms tearing clouds
scenes.narration: 两团光束穿入草海，血虹领跑白光紧咬掀起音爆犹如雷霆轰鸣。

scenes.description: 韩立停在半空布置剑阵，青色剑光铺展成鱼鳞。

visual.composition: Han Li surrounded by layered sword lights

scenes.prompt: cultivator hovering mid-air arranging azure sword formation, fish-scale pattern around him
scenes.narration: 韩立骤停于半空，袖口洒出剑光铺展成鱼鳞剑幕森然列阵护身。

scenes.description: 噬金虫云环绕韩立，化作三色护甲贴身缠绕。

visual.composition: Swirling insect cloud forming armor on body

scenes.prompt: close shot of insect cloud forming protective armor around cultivator, tri-colored glow
scenes.narration: 噬金虫云旋绕凝甲，三色光层贴体犹如战甲寒意逼人守候。

scenes.description: 韩立祭出银钟与剑光，同时朝御风车轰去。

visual.composition: Silver bell above, sword wave below heading toward chariot

scenes.prompt: dynamic shot of silver bell and azure sword wave racing toward magical chariot, intense action
scenes.narration: 韩立双指一弹，银钟青虹并起直扑御风车势若惊涛狂啸。

scenes.description: 穆姓法士现身，托着蓝色宝珠撑起光幕抵挡。

visual.composition: Elder floating above chariot with blue sphere overhead

scenes.prompt: low-angle shot of elder cultivator holding glowing blue orb projecting barrier, confident stance
scenes.narration: 车顶蓝光隆起，穆姓法士托珠立于白光上空稳守如山岳。

scenes.description: 穆上师开口试探，韩立淡然回应。

visual.composition: Two figures facing mid-air with speech gestures

scenes.prompt: shot-reverse-shot of two airborne cultivators exchanging words, tension visible
scenes.narration: 他开口欲谈，语气阴寒，仍试图探知韩立缘由，以便布阵揣测。

scenes.description: 韩立发动剑阵，青色巨剑自阵中劈向蓝幕与巨蟒。

visual.composition: Massive sword descending with trails

scenes.prompt: dramatic shot of giant azure sword descending toward glowing barrier and serpent, intense energy
scenes.narration: 韩立淡笑拒绝，剑阵凝出百丈巨剑劈向光幕与蓝蟒杀机直露。

scenes.description: 蓝色丝网扩张，将巨剑困在其中。

visual.composition: Web-like barrier wrapping sword

scenes.prompt: close shot of glowing blue energy web constricting massive sword, runes pulsing
scenes.narration: 湛蓝丝网骤展封锁巨剑，网纹闪烁将剑锋层层缠死暂遏锋芒。

scenes.description: 穆上师放出漫天冰晶，箭雨般扑向韩立与虫罩。

visual.composition: Countless ice shards raining down

scenes.prompt: wide shot of cultivator unleashing blizzard of crystalline shards at opponent, cold palette
scenes.narration: 穆上师骤施冰晶术，寒晶似箭雨倾泻直扑虫罩与韩立劲寒透骨。

scenes.description: 花篮古宝化白雾吸收冰晶，虫罩亮起挡下攻击。

visual.composition: White mist swirl absorbing shards around glowing barrier

scenes.prompt: magical white mist devouring ice shards around protective barrier, serene yet powerful
scenes.narration: 花篮古宝化白雾吞晶，虫罩复原只余冷雾在光膜间游走，若无其事。

scenes.description: 银钟震鸣，青虹趁机脱困再砸向穆上师。

visual.composition: Silver shockwave shattering web while sword surges

scenes.prompt: dynamic shot of silver bell's shockwave shattering energy web as azure sword surges free
scenes.narration: 银钟轰鸣荡碎蓝网，青虹再脱困劈向法士头顶，威势滔天逼近。

scenes.description: 韩立掌心显现湛蓝冰花，寒焰翻腾。

visual.composition: Hand holding intricate blue ice flower emitting flame

scenes.prompt: extreme close-up of hand holding glowing blue ice flower emitting cold flame, dramatic lighting
scenes.narration: 韩立掌托湛蓝冰花，乾蓝冰焰翻腾令穆上师心生寒意难掩惧色。

scenes.description: 穆上师召出黑色巨峰，山体暴涨压下。

visual.composition: Massive black mountain forming above chariot

scenes.prompt: low angle shot of black magical mountain manifesting overhead, oppressive and heavy
scenes.narration: 穆上师怒祭黑色巨峰，山体涨至百丈，重压如坠陨星直逼而下。

scenes.description: 韩立展开风雷翅，瞬移躲开巨峰重击。

visual.composition: Lightning wings flashing as figure blurs away from falling mountain

scenes.prompt: lightning-clad cultivator blinking away from descending black mountain, energetic shot
scenes.narration: 韩立背生风雷翅，银电一闪瞬移避开重压，稳立远处残光未散，令人心惊。

scenes.description: 韩立心生杀机，冰焰化火团压向穆上师，剑钟再度夹击。

visual.composition: Blue flame sphere leading sword wave and silver bell toward elder

scenes.prompt: three-quarter view of cultivator sending blue flame sphere with sword wave and silver bell converging on foe
scenes.narration: 他心念杀机，冰焰凝成火团扑向老者同时剑钟再成夹击逼迫命门。

scenes.description: 穆上师祭出四面冰盾与光幕勉强撑住攻势。

visual.composition: Elder encased by layered translucent shields

scenes.prompt: cultivator surrounded by multiple translucent ice shields shaking under assault, tense scene
scenes.narration: 穆上师口吐四面冰盾，护身光幕叠加勉强撑住青剑与银波险象环生。

scenes.description: 韩立放出青冥针，冰盾被冻结成碎屑。

visual.composition: Needle-like streaks piercing shields turning them to ice shards

scenes.prompt: close action shot of numerous needles piercing magical shields, freezing and shattering them
scenes.narration: 韩立袖中青冥针爆射，冰盾被齐齐冻结化作碎屑飘散震慑满场。

scenes.description: 黑色巨峰再次笼罩剑钟，穆上师同时操控御风车准备逃离。

visual.composition: Black mountain aura covering weapons while chariot shrinks

scenes.prompt: wide shot of dark mountain aura suppressing weapons as magical chariot reshapes for escape
scenes.narration: 穆上师再催黑峰罩落，禁锢青剑银钟同时操控御风车准备遁走。

scenes.description: 韩立以风雷翅瞬移到车侧，冰焰手掌直探向穆上师。

visual.composition: Blurred figure appearing beside chariot with glowing hand

scenes.prompt: dynamic close shot of cultivator flashing beside chariot with hand wrapped in blue flame reaching forward
scenes.narration: 韩立雷光一闪现身车侧，乾蓝冰焰包裹手掌直探向老者胸膛要害。

scenes.description: 冰焰瞬间封住穆上师半身，丹阳真火艰难抵抗。

visual.composition: Elder partially encased in blue ice, small red flame at chest

scenes.prompt: close shot of enemy being encased in blue ice flames while small red fire struggles, dramatic lighting
scenes.narration: 冰焰瞬间封住半身，穆上师仅靠丹阳真火苦撑眼看魂飞魄散。

scenes.description: 元婴遁出抱走宝珠逃向远空，韩立拎起躯壳冷眼以待。

visual.composition: Small blue light fleeing while Han Li holds frozen body mid-air
visual.character_pose: Han Li clutching corpse, looking into distance

scenes.prompt: wide shot of nascent soul fleeing as cultivator holds frozen corpse, dramatic dusk sky
scenes.narration: 绝境之下元婴遁出抱走宝珠，躯壳坠落韩立冷眸锁定远空再谋追击。

scenes.description: 片尾画面：暮色笼罩草原，远空仍可见逃遁的蓝色光点。

visual.composition: Prairie dusk with faint blue streak in sky

scenes.prompt: dusk prairie landscape with faint blue light streak escaping in sky, ominous ending shot
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，下集即将揭晓追击善后，敬请期待。
